# Rownames_to_column
 
## Brief Description
Rownames_to_column is a function to convert the row names of a data frame, matrix, or table into a character vector.  

## What Package Contain It
The Rownames_to_column function is contained within the dplyr package.           

## When to Use It
This function is used when the row names of a data frame, matrix, or table need to be extracted in order to identify and perform operations on a subset of the data.
